picard.sam.markduplicates.util
Class ReadEnds

java.lang.Object
  picard.sam.markduplicates.util.ReadEnds
All Implemented Interfaces:
OpticalDuplicateFinder.PhysicalLocation
Direct Known Subclasses:
ReadEndsForMarkDuplicates, ReadEndsForMateCigar
public abstract class ReadEnds
extends java.lang.Object
implements OpticalDuplicateFinder.PhysicalLocation

Little struct-like class to hold read pair (and fragment) end data for duplicate marking.
